text: Curtis Eugene Davies (born 15 March 1985) is a former professional footballer who played as a centre-back. Born in England, he represented the Sierra Leone national team. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League League League FA Cup FA Cup
